text: Anagha is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Babu Narayanan, starring Nedumudi Venu and Parvathi Jayaram in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/anagha-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Nedumudi Venu * Murali * Parvathi Jayaram * Vasanth * Captain Raju * Pavithran * Jagannadha Varma * Jomol * Mamukkoya * Thodupuzha Vasanthy * Vineeth Kumar * Sudha * Aparna * Jayanthi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Babu Narayanan
title: Anagha (film)
